name: Bus Driver - Pocket Edition
description:
Take the wheel of 12 different buses all modeled from real-world vehicles such as the American school bus or London's double-decker buses for a realistic driving experience. An optimized interface and controls include all-new tilt steering and trackpad steering for easier handling and more intuitive play. 

Over 35 routes to drive day and night, in different weather conditions and settings from city to suburbs to countryside. Test your ability to avoid parked cars, motorists, cyclists, pedestrians and unforeseen obstacles en route as you transport passengers from pick up to destination safely and on time. Your passengers are counting on you! Missions include a variety of objectives and time-based challenges of differing difficulty levels so dedicated and casual players of all ages will have a great ride.

GAME FEATURES:
• Authentic bus driving simulation app for drivers of all ages
• New accelerometer tilt steering and trackpad steering for easy handling
• New enhanced night driving features
• 12 bus types including single-deck buses, double-deckers and low-floor buses from around the world
• 35+ routes and destinations to drive and unlock from cityscapes, modern and old towns to the suburbs, airport, harbor, countryside and more
• 6 missions include driving children on a school bus, tourists on a sight-seeing tour to more dangerous assignments such as transporting prisoners from one location to another
• Determine the most efficient bus routes following traffic laws and the rules of the road to transport your passengers safely 
• Cross device compatible - buy once and play on iPad®, iPhone® and iPod Touch®

TECHNICAL NOTE:
• Bus Driver minimum device requirements: iPhone 4S+, iPad 2+, iPod 5th generation.
• To improve performance and stability please remember to shut down all running apps.
